title: WANT TO BUY: T206's Low Grade
author: Craig M

posts.post_title: WANT TO BUY: T206's Low Grade
posts.post_content:
I am just starting a T206 low grade set and would like to buy your T206 old beaters in any condition to get started. Willing to pay $5 each plus shipping. Please pm me with quantity and form of payment.

Thanks,

Craig

Hi Steve,

I'm having a little luck getting T206's for an old beater set; it's going to be a long road but real fun.

Let me know if you have some old beaters you want to find a nice new home.

Craig

Craig,

You'll do a lot better if you post in the T card section.  This is the 19th century BST.  Good luck on your hunt!

Best,

Andy

[quote name="AndyG09" post=1078677]Craig,

You'll do a lot better if you post in the T card section.  This is the 19th century BST.  Good luck on your hunt!

Best,

Andy[/QUOTE]

I moved this to the correct section. And as a shameless but very legitimate plug we at Brockelman and Luckey Auctions will have several hundred very low grade, first time to the hobby, T206s in our next auction, next month. We will try to put them in a bit smaller lot sizes so everyone can afford them. Our preview won't be up until a few days before the auction...   [url]www.b-lauctions.com[/url]    best regards

Thanks Andy!

It's a nice feeling to have guys offer help to a newbie; something that we need more of in this world today.

Six new ones arrived in the mail yesterday. A couple of them had almost 100 creases but for some reason the cards still had nice appeal to me. When looking at the cards; I almost didn't notice all of the creases.

Keep 'em coming!

I will keep an eye on your auction.

Craig

I meant to thank both Leon and Andy!!!

Craig

I just sent Frank and you (Jim) a pm. Thanks for your help in getting me started.

I will have a few duplicates to use as trade bait so don't worry about dupes. I am still looking for more...

Craig

Thank you for the purchase and the prompt payment Craig. I hope you enjoy these cards. They are well loved, but perfect for your collection. Happy hunting and enjoy the board, it's a great place here.
